actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Natural Resources, and in addition to the Committees on Energy and Commerce, Financial Services, and Transportation and Infrastructure, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

official_title: To amend the Mineral Leasing Act to make certain improvements in the laws relating to coal royalties, and for other purposes.
short_title: Coal Royalty Fairness and Communities Investment Act of 2018
